content: Indeed, Jonas. I hate confrontation, and thought we’d just skip over the anger part of parent/child relations but Scott sniffed that out like a bloodhound and kept shoving my face in it. Bless his heart. Such good teachers, our children (two people who hate conflict should get into it, you think? lolol. Pull my hair and I’ll, I’ll. Ur, give me time to think about it).
